reviewText:
just go to jw dot org
on the bottom right click on "watch sign language videos"
you can choose whatever sign language you prefer
this video is toward the bottom/middle of the page

Or

Request this free from one of Jehovahs witnesses you can use the contact me form at jw org for this

We loved this video. We watched it as a family. Our daughter took a year of ASL to Help the deaf to understand that God did not create people to have hearing loss. In the Bible God promises that the deaf will hear in the near future! This video teaches that God's son Jesus, will restore people to perfect health. It's in the Bible so you can trust it!
